title: CrackShot插件问题
author: ccbuqaz
txt_content:
[11:30:05 INFO]: [CrackShot] 'IRONGOLEM_HIT-1-2-0' of weapon 'AK47' contains either an invalid number or sound!
[11:30:05 INFO]: [CrackShot] 'SKELETON_HURT-1-2-0' of weapon 'AK47' contains either an invalid number or sound!
[11:30:05 INFO]: [CrackShot] 'ZOMBIE_WOOD-1-2-0' of weapon 'AK47' contains either an invalid number or sound!
直接上报错了
怎么修复这个
说AK没有声音文件什么的  怎么办

replies.author: a89969453
replies.txt_content: 我也是这个问题，它是说这个声效的声音或者是数字有错误，我目前也在想办法解决

replies.author: JarKue
replies.txt_content: 可能是没有空格？：后面没空格？
